Summary: Long and white with dark spot in the middle the reflects some sunlight
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ranson
There were no other sightings in Ranson on or around November 5th 2012
divs: Sighting Details1. In backyard letting my dogs go to the bathroom. 2. Something kept telling me to watch the sky and I noticed movement 3. Thought it was an airplane at first. 4. Elongated and white with no descriptive markings that I could see. There was a dark spot in the middle that I first assumed were the wings of an airplane. It was flying flying north to south and at some point the part that I thought were wings reflected sunlight. It was flying straight and parallel to the ground. 5. My thoughts were,"Again? This is the third sighting I've had in a month after years of seeing nothing! Is something about to happen!? Just about every two weeks I've had a sighting?" 6. Flew out of my line of sight.
